steps.title: Define Persona
steps.description: Upload refs, link LoRA(s), set style guardrails, add negative prompts. Build your AI identity once.

steps.title: Generate Sets
steps.description: Spin 10–50 variants per brief. Auto-crop, safe margins, text-safe zones, A/B tags for testing.

steps.title: Approve & Caption
steps.description: Pick winners, autowrite hooks/hashtags, light edits, brand check. Quality control in your hands.

steps.title: Distribute & Learn
steps.description: Push to IG/TikTok/Shorts/X. Track retention, CTR, saves, comments. Iterate and improve.

items.question: Can I import existing LoRAs/refs?
items.answer: Yes—attach them to a persona and set the guardrails. Upload your existing LoRA models, reference images, and style guides. Our system integrates with your current workflow.

items.question: Can I post directly to IG/TikTok?
items.answer: We use official APIs where available; some flows publish drafts for manual finalize. Full automation for supported platforms, with review workflows for others.

items.question: Who owns the outputs?
items.answer: You do. You can export raw assets and metadata anytime. Full ownership of all generated content, with no usage restrictions or licensing fees.

items.question: How does the AI learn my style?
items.answer: Through persona rigs combining LoRAs, reference images, prompt kits, and style guardrails. Upload 10-20 examples and set visual preferences for consistent results.

items.question: Which platforms do you support?
items.answer: Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, X (Twitter), Facebook, and Pinterest. We optimize content format, sizing, and captions for each platform automatically.

items.question: What's included in A/B testing?
items.answer: Generate multiple variants per concept, auto-tag for tracking, and compare performance metrics like watch time, CTR, saves, and comments across versions.

items.question: Can I review content before it posts?
items.answer: Absolutely. Set up automatic posting or review everything before it goes live. Approval workflows, team collaboration, and scheduling controls included.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Plans start at $19/month with credit-based usage. All plans include persona training and multi-platform posting. Higher tiers include LoRA training credits and priority processing.
